div.p: Josefine, daughter of Salomon Samuel Bloch and Bertha Bloch, wife of Dr. Eduard Violin, hence sister-in-law to Moriz Violin. Josefine and Eduard had two children: Karl (born January 12, 1906) and Hildegard (Hilda) (born May, 23, 1909).

div.head: Josefine Violin and Heinrich Schenker
div.p: One notecard from her to Ludwig Karpath, which he forwarded to Schenker, survives, OC 18/45, January 23, 1933, which Schenker received on the 25th,reporting the death of Karl Violin. However, Schenker had already received the news from her direct on January 23: "From Fini Violin (letter): at Floriz's request, she reports little Karli's passing!").
